pf2e-skill-increases.title: Skill Manager
pf2e-skill-increases.proficiencyPreselected: This skill is preselected by a feat or a class feature.
pf2e-skill-increases.skillsMaxIncreasesReached: You have reached the maximum amount of skill increases for this level.
pf2e-skill-increases.proficiencyDecreaseNotAllowed: This skill was selected on a previous level and cannot be decreased.
pf2e-skill-increases.levelTooLow: Your level is too low for the selected proficiency rank.
pf2e-skill-increases.illegalLevel: There are more selected skill increases than allowed.
